petitionerArgument.violatedCode: CSFRA Sec. 1707(d) and Chapter 7, Section C
petitionerArgument.summaryOfViolation: Undue tenant hardship due to rent increase exceeding 50% of income for senior tenant

petitions.reimbursement: Rent credit for increases paid between Sept 1-Oct 9, 2022
